data.title: Rachel DiPaola - Chief of Staff at Big Fish Games
data.meta_description: Rachel DiPaola is the Chief of Staff and Senior Director of Transformation at Big Fish Games and brings with her more than 25 years of game industry experi
data.text:
Rachel DiPaola is the Chief of Staff and Senior Director of Transformation at Big Fish Games and brings with her more than 25 years of game industry experience. As Chief of Staff, Rachel is the right hand to the Big Fish President and executive team, leading the implementation of critical company initiatives across teams.

Rachel is a strategist, consultant, and implementer, identifying opportunities for improvement and executing streamlined processes across the organization based on the priorities of the business. Rachel acts as a change agent who converts initiatives into action and assists with the daily operations of the organization.

Rachel has led the publishing and development of over 75 titles across multiple platforms and genres, having previously worked for Disney, Jam City, 2K, Zynga, and more across the gaming industry. Rachel is passionate about mentorship of employees as well as junior professionals in the video game industry.

When not working on Big Fish Games, Rachel can be found hiking on Mt. Tamalpais, reading, or riding her E-bike around town.
